<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Invoke the Crimson Oath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1098) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Reclaimant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1097)

</column>

---

You can invoke the Crimson Oath to unleash blasts of ruby energy from your weapon. You gain the [_invoke the Crimson Oath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=556) focus spell. If you don’t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to recite the Crimson Oath and meditate on its teachings; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your knight reclaimant focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

<title level="2">Invoke the Crimson Oath leads to...</title>
[The Tyrant Falls!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3596)
name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
